name: Crackin' DJ Part 2
overview:
A DJ simulator, where players can hone their skills on the replica turn tables. Players can choose from 22 tracks, each track has it's own difficulty level displayed with the track name.

In this game the player's life gauge is called the groove meter, bad cuts decrease the meter, good cuts increase the meter. At the bottom of the screen is a device that's shows the intensity of the cuts needed. Players can also use the cross fader lever when needed.
